verses.verse: The elders4245, 3588 <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> I <S%G3870>exhort<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> am a <S%G4850>fellow-elder<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G3144>witness<s%> of the <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, who am <S%G2532>also<s%> a <S%G2844>partaker<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> that <S%G3195>shall<s%> be <S%G601>revealed<s%>:

Tend <S%G4165><s%> the <S%G4168>flock<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> which is <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, exercising the <S%G1983>oversight<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> of <S%G317>constraint<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1596>willingly<s%>, according to the will of <S%G3366>God<s%>; nor yet for filthy <S%G147>lucre<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> of a ready <S%G4290>mind<s%>;

neither <S%G3366><s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> lording it <S%G2634>over<s%> the <S%G2819>charge<s%> allotted to <S%G235>you<s%>, but <S%G1096>making<s%> yourselves <S%G5179>ensamples<s%> to the <S%G4168>flock<s%>.
And <S%G2532>when<s%> the chief <S%G750>Shepherd<s%> shall be <S%G5319>manifested<s%>, ye shall <S%G2865>receive<s%> the <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G1391>glory<s%> that fadeth not <S%G262>away<s%>.

Likewise <S%G3668><s%>, <S%G240>ye<s%> <S%G3501>younger<s%>, be <S%G5293>subject<s%> unto the <S%G4245>elder<s%>. <S%G1161>Yea<s%>, <S%G3956>all<s%> of you gird yourselves <S%G1463>with<s%> <S%G5012>humility<s%>, to serve one <S%G5293>another<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G498>resisteth<s%> the <S%G5244>proud<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1325>giveth<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> to the <S%G5011>humble<s%>.

Humble <S%G5013>yourselves<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G2900>mighty<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G5312>exalt<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> due <S%G2540>time<s%>;

Be <S%G3525>sober<s%>, be <S%G1127>watchful<s%>: <S%G3754><s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G476>adversary<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G5612>roaring<s%> <S%G3023>lion<s%>, walketh <S%G4043>about<s%>, <S%G2212>seeking<s%> <S%G5101>whom<s%> he may <S%G2666>devour<s%>,

whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G436>withstand<s%> <S%G4731>stedfast<s%> in your <S%G4102>faith<s%>, knowing <S%G1492>that<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> are <S%G2005>accomplished<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G81>brethren<s%> who are <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G2248>you<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2424><s%> after that ye have <S%G3958>suffered<s%> a little <S%G3641>while<s%>, <S%G2675>shall<s%> himself846, Romans9 <S%G2675>perfect<s%>, <S%G4741>establish<s%>, <S%G4599>strengthen<s%> <S%G2311>you<s%>.

By <S%G1223><s%> <S%G4610>Silvanus<s%>, our <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> I <S%G3049>account<s%> <S%G1223>him<s%>, I have <S%G1125>written<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3641>briefly<s%>, <S%G3870>exhorting<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1957>testifying<s%> that <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1511>is<s%> the <S%G227>true<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>. <S%G2476>Stand<s%> ye <S%G3739>fast<s%> <S%G1519>therein<s%>.

She that is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G897>Babylon<s%>, elect together <S%G4899>with<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G782>saluteth<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> so doth Mark <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%>.

Salute <S%G782><s%> one <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G5370>kiss<s%> of <S%G26>love<s%>. <S%G1515>Peace<s%> be unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> are in1722, 2424 <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.
